      public boolean isIndexTaken​(java.lang.String courseIndex)
      Finds if course index is taken by the student.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • existingCourseCode

      public boolean existingCourseCode​(java.lang.String courseCode)
      check if CourseCode input exists in database
      Parameters:
      courseCode - input course code
      Returns:

    • addCourses

      public java.lang.String addCourses​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String school, java.lang.String noOfAUs, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> courseIndex, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> vacancy)
      Add course to the student's database only if the course index is not already taken.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - course Code
      courseName - course Name
      school - school
      noOfAUs - number Of AUs
      courseIndex - ArrayList of String, each element containing a course Index
      vacancy - ArrayList of String, each element containing the vacancy for the corresponding course Index
      Returns:
      true if course has been added. Else return error in adding course explaining that the index is not available.

    • retrieveCourse

      public java.lang.String retrieveCourse() throws java.io.IOException
      Prints out the whole list of courses in the database with information regarding its course code, course name and its course index.
      Returns:
      course list as course code, course name as well as its course index.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs

    • printSchedule

      public java.lang.String printSchedule​(java.lang.String schedule)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      result with the information regarding the course index's day, time and location.

    • updateCourse

      public java.lang.String updateCourse()
      Update Course details in the database.
      Returns:
      "Courses updated successfully." if Courses were updated successfully, return "Error updating courses." otherwise
